channel.title: Cost Management and Resource Usage on RESOURCE USAGE AND COST MANAGEMENT WITH IAM ON AWS
channel.description: Recent content in Cost Management and Resource Usage on RESOURCE USAGE AND COST MANAGEMENT WITH IAM ON AWS

item.title: Validate policy effectiveness
item.description: Validate the effectiveness of the policy by creating an EC2 instance in the allowed Region Click on the name of the currently logged-in user. Click Sign out. Click Log back in At IAM user name enter the user we created (testuser). At Password enter the password we have set up (Testuser123). Click Sign in. If you failed to log in, please check the user and password information created in the previous steps.
